resources.string: Select a currency and press the left value to change it
Tap to finish, archive or delete
Currency rates are regularly updated in line with the data provided by the exchange rates API.
Touch to delete. To change the goal, go to the goal edit
Manage your goals, it\'s that simple! Create order in your home budget, 3 goals is challenging enough, complete the main goal to move on to the next one!
Flip the main card to see the progress of the target
When you reach a goal, you can delete or archive it. The future goal 1 becomes the main goal.
